questiontext.text: Inferential statistics is about

answer.text: Making a decision about one or more populations based on one or more samples.

feedback.text: Make a decision about one or more populations based on one or more samples…: Correct

answer.text: Make a decision about one or more samples based on one or more populations.

feedback.text: Make a decision about one or more samples based on one or more populations…: Incorrect

answer.text: Make a decision about one or more samples assuming one or more populations are well sampled.

feedback.text: Make a decision about one or more samples assuming one or more populations are well sampled…: Incorrect
